name: SpringZid: Hero of Evania (DEMO)
description:
Controls:

  • Z (A button): Jump
  • X (B Button): Sprint
  • Arrow Keys (D-Pad): Move around
  • Enter (Start): Start Game

Story: SpringZid was casually chilling at home when suddenly a giant starship captured all his friends (and at least 75% of Evania's population), deployed robots and even started polluting the carp out of the planet. Now it's up to the SpringZid to stop this nonsense.

Note: The full version of this game will only be available via. physical copies.
